title: My first comment about the Pre-season changes
body:
I cant speak about playing against her, but playing LeBlanc is just so much fun.
She went from boring as fuck, where all you do is just mash buttons until they die, to actually fuckin strategising before you go in.

Im loving it!

replies.body:
Nah.

New LeBlanc is trash tier. She's outclassed by every other assassin now. She may as well be a mage.

> [{quoted}](name=Third Reich,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ptsIsRc8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-09T04:09:35.268+0000)
>
> Nah.
> 
> New LeBlanc is trash tier. She's outclassed by every other assassin now. She may as well be a mage.

lul, she is a mage

> [{quoted}](name=Justice4Harambe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ptsIsRc8,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-09T04:50:11.870+0000)
>
> lul, she is a mage

She was an assassin.
How funny, This new leblanc looks so boring and stupid compared to old leblanc. i guess that's what happens when a champions retires from being an assassin...
I hate versing the new Leblanc {{champion:7}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

no love for {{champion:38}} , i mean cmon that passive could have got some love.

sigh.
